content.question: Directions: You have 25 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take up to 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline your answer. Identify the political phenomenon represented on the map. Explain the relationship between redistricting and the census. Identify and discuss TWO political consequences that could result from redistricting.

frqParts.text: Directions: You have 25 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take up to 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline your answer. Identify the political phenomenon represented on the map. Explain the relationship between redistricting and the census. Identify and discuss TWO political consequences that could result from redistricting.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
